Dr Ning Liu

Postdoctoral research fellow in Environmental Science with expert knowledge and experience in GIS & RS, modelling, climate change and carbon mitigation.

Research interests

  • GIS and remote sensing
  • Ecohydrology modelling
  • Agricultural science
  • Climate change and global biogeochemical cycle
  • Machine learning and big data computing

    • Research experience

  • 2018-- , Post Doctoral research fellow, Murdoch University, Western Australia, Australia
  • 2014--2017, PhD, Environmental Science, Murdoch University, Western Australia, Australia
  • 2010--2013, MSc, Ecology, Chinese Academy of Forestry, Beijing, China
  • 2006--2010, BSc, Forestry, Shandong Agriculture University, Tai'an, China
